actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to include insomnia within the list of chronic diseases for which compensation may be provided under such title for a service-connected disability.

summary.text: Includes insomnia among the chronic diseases for purposes of the administration of service-connected disability compensation by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to include insomnia within the list of chronic diseases for which compensation may be provided under such title for a service-connected disability.
